alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FOREST...MARINETTE... SOUTHEASTERN ONEIDA...NORTHERN OCONTO AND CENTRAL LANGLADE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crandon to Woodlawn to 9 miles south of Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Crandon, Crivitz, Pembine, Mountain, Goodman, Wausaukee, Pound, White Lake, Carter, and Pearson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Southern Marinette County
